    1. With the switch of @MicrosoftEdge to Chromium today, all major browsers now show invisible text by default during web font load. This marks an end to a 12-year trend started by WebKit in 2008. First picture is Edge 18, second is Edgium 79. Full history: zachleat.com/web/fout-foit-history/
